entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning then becoming south 20 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
